pullRequest.body:
From sphere-eversion; I'm just submitting these.
Thanks to @urkud for some review suggestions.

---

- [ ] depends on: #9673 because of the git history

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7542954233/job/20532901989)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7542954233/job/20532901360)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7542954233/job/20532900910)

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion sSup (â‹ƒ i, t i) = â¨† i, sSup (t i) := by ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion sSup (â‹ƒ i, t i) = â¨† i, sSup (t i) := by ```
I'm not sure that we need these lemmas. E.g., RHS is not in the `simp`-normal form.
Indeed, they were not used (in sphere-eversion either). Deleted.

We have this lemma as [nhdsSet_prod_le](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Topology/Compactness/Compact.html#nhdsSet_prod_le)
Please move it here instead of adding it under a new name.

[IsOpen.mem_nhdsSet](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Topology/NhdsSet.html#IsOpen.mem_nhdsSet) is the `simp`-normal version of this lemma upgraded to `iff`. Also, we use `eventually_nhdsSet`, not `forall_near` in Mathlib.
Why would we add a lemma and deprecate it in the same commit? IMHO, a better approach is to migrate `sphere-eversion` to `self_of_nhdsSet`.
Sure, in fact I already did this replacement in sphere-eversion locally. Looks like I forgot to also do this here.
I think that this is true for any complete lattice, with a proof like `eq_of_forall_ge_iff fun _ => by simp` (not tested). If true, then should go to `Data.Set.Lattice`.
It holds in any complete lattice; the above proof doesn't quite work. aesop could do it; I've slightly reduced its output.
This should be stated for `Î¹ : Sort*`

```suggestion
  simp_rw [sSup_eq_iSup, iSup_iUnion]
```
Isn't this exactly [eventually_nhdsSet_iff_forall](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Topology/NhdsSet.html#eventually_nhdsSet_iff_forall)?
Indeed! Dropped.
